description: An unauthenticated Denial-of-Service (DoS) vulnerability exists in the ANSI escape code service accessed via the PAPI protocol. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability results in the ability to interrupt the normal operation of the affected Access Point.

product.name: Aruba InstantOS and Aruba Access Points running ArubaOS 10

enisaIdProduct.product_version: InstantOS or ArubaOS (access points) 8.11.x.x: 8.11.2.1 and below.
